Replies.Reply: Written by  Lorenzo Semple Jr.
What was that, fellas?
Sure -- my pleasure.
I'm not a stranger exactly -- You know my name.
Of course.
Backwards?
I can fly all right -- I've had a couple of lessons! -- just don't if I can land!
Grab that other wheel! Help me pull her up!
No but I'd sure like to! How'd The man fall ninety stories didn't break a bone?
Brace yourself I'm aiming at that field up ahead!

Its thousands of panes reflect the RED SUN and the RED BOLTS which rain down in intermittent bursts. One strikes an end of a gallery, exploding glass and foliage. From inside, we HEAR a furious echoing VOICE:  ZARKOV'S VOICE I see you, Munson! Come out or I shoot!
Dale! Are you all right?
Come on -- let's get out before she blows!
Hello. i'm Flash Gordon, this is Miss Dale Arden --
This crazy storm knocked us down could we use a phone?
Some weather huh?
Well, all right -- but it seems to me we ought to --
Mister, you are insane!
Go with the flow -- wait for a chance!
Take off for where?
Made it where, Doctor?
Hello -- my name's Flash Gordon --
Hi!
Thanks, Doctor -- next time I'll call my own play.

Another strange glimpse through an opening. Some fierce tethered BEAST is being goaded and tormented by MONGO MEN, as in an Elizabethan bear-baiting. On the floor lies the tor n body of one MAN who apparently got too close.
What are you doing?
You got us into this -- HOW DO WE GET OUT?
Dr. Zarkov, I'm about to show you what it feels like to be clipped by a New York Giant --
I'm Flash Gordon of the New York Giants this is Dale Arden -- Dr.Zarkov hijacked us in an effort to save EARTH.
But why? What in hell have we ever done to hurt you?
Oh no you don't! We came together and we're STAYING together!
Watch out! Behind you!
I can't -- I just can't --
Clobber a woman, Dale --
Hit what water?
You're saving my life. How can I Thank you?
Let's get one thing straight -- I've got to find Dale and that nut Zarkov too -- rescue them and try to save Earth too.
I'm no good at lying.
What's that?
Listen, where's he got Dale?
What?? Marry her? What are you talking about??
Can I honestly?
Here we are where?
Those are ROCKET SHIPS in there! I can't fly a damn rocket ship!
Some lucky people live on that one too?
Why don't they team up and fight him?
Sue -- but that wasn't a team effort.
Why?
You can really transfer your thoughts with that? Like I could get in touch with Dale?
Please.
not pulling out until you put that gadget over my head and tune me in to Dale Arden!
Sorry. I guess landings aren't my thing.

It hangs snagged in a huge vine, like a creature caught by some monstrous boa-constrictor. This is a complete world of green, the light, the feeling of the air. Everything rings with forest SOUNDS. The very sky is shut from view by leaves and foliage.
Where's Robin Hood?
It doesn't matter. How do we get down.
Listen -- are you sure this Barin will help me?
It's amazing -- I dreamed of this tree-house when I was a kid --
These are the guys who are gonna help me?
I know just how he feels -- we played the Pittsburgh Steelers last year.
I'm from Earth, Prince Barin. My friends and I were Ming's prisoners.
Keep me for.....????
Oh, my god. I trusted you.
I think I'll pass on this one.
He swallows, Looks at the stump, at BARIN with his bloody sword, to the stump again, then at AURA. He crosses close and stares into her glittering eyes.
Would you give Dale a message from me? Tell her I'm sorry how things have panned out -- I Loved her.
What the hell? Forget it. Sending that message by you is like sending a lettuce-leaf by a rabbit.
Whew! -- Your turn, Prince Barin.
What are you waiting for?
Boy. You oughta be handled with a forked stick yourself.
You can speak?
Have we a chance, Tiger Man?
What do you mean?
Damn. End of the line.
Snatches the crossbow off TIGER MAN'S back, cocks it, notches it quickly with a GLASS ARROW from the quiver.
How far will this take us?
Blue. We call is blue.
What's the point of all this killing?
Where's Dale?
Dale baby!
Yes -- it was me --
Every thought, baby! --
As FLASH and DALE are lowered on it.
Replies.Didascalie: (BARIN, DALE, FLASH, HAWKPEOPLE, TIGER MAN, VULTAN)

Replies.Reply: We're all Ming's prisoners. I say let's team up and smash him.
Well, back home it's what I'm paid for -- I called a pretty good game against the Dallas Cowboys once ---
Oh god -- here we go again --
When I had that damn snake in my hand, I could've poked it in your face and KILLED you.
I've got to.
I ask you to swear, Barin -- if you defeat me, you'll join Vultan against Ming! If for no other reasons, because you'll never have Aura as long as her father lives!-
Quite a lot!
Try to catch my wrist! -- the other one.
Swing your body -- see if you can get a leg up here!
Guess the first thing you and me are gonna do after we land..!
Gonna do it first thing -- around here, never know if you'll get another chance!
I'm coming, Dale!
Follow her -- climb!
Let him go -- I understand.
Thanks anyway for getting us this far!
What's the game-plan?
What's the matter, darling?
Zarkov is right.
Wow. Call Westchester Approach, see what they've got.
Seat-belt time.
What's ,e word from Westchester Approach, Bill?
On the left, about six o'clock high......
Hold on tight, let's put baby down right here......
But nothing you'd want to toss a third-down pass through either --
Can I have an autograph for my kid, Mr. Gordon?
Zip. All chanels dead.
Say, get a load of the VOR's....
Will you SHUT UP?
Look, Mister Flash Gordon, they have their hands full -- just let 'em drive.
The plane buffets. FLASH is sent reeling, catches hold of the rack above DALE, lowers himself into the seat next to her. He buckles fast, takes out a candy bar and offers it to her.
Thanks a lot -- I look dumb enough to take candy from a stranger?
Who doesn't. Number one draft pick, cover of PEOPLE mag -- what'd the GIANTS sign you for, eighty-nine million? Big deal!
God, I hate flying -- I'm Dale Arden it's crazy of me to hate flying --
Holy cow! Look at the clouds!
Can you fly it?
Oh boy! Ever hear about the man who fell ninety stories from a window and didn't break a bone?
The window was ninety-one stories up!
I'm terrific.
Flash Gordon, you have just made me a Giant fan for life.
You're Dr. Hans Zarkov!
I saw you in PEOPLE mag. After you left NASA, remember? It said you were utterly ---
Flash, let's find some other phone, okay? I'm sure Dr. Zarkov is very busy.......
Look, Doc -- I don't book kamikaze tours -- never.
Flash! Sack him!
Don't. Suddenly I like it in here just fine --

The door of the CAPSULE is opened from the inside. ZARKOV and DALE and FLASH get out. THE MEN stop. Long beat as the two parties gaze at each other, the first human eye ever to see an extraterrestrial being. FLASH walks up to the leader.
Just do what I'm doing. Flash --
Shutting my eyes -- dreaming I booked us to Disneyland.

A gigantic STATUE comes into view amidst topless columns at the end. Light plays over it in ever-shifting patterns. As we come nearer, we SEE that this STATUE is cut out in the middle to form a throne.
You're mad.
Flash, it's no use - he's too crazy!
Watch it, fella -- you came with me!
You dirty old bastard can kill me too!
My God -- and I thought that book was another rip-off-
What's the play, Flash?
Can't what?
You damn fool, those aren't women they're murderous AMAZON DYKES!
Help!!
Flash!!
What is it -- some rotten drug?
Flash! Where are you??
Say, this stuff isn't bad at all.
I'm dreaming.
Very.
No, thanks. Just turn down the light a bit, would you? I'm shy.
Will it fly?
It has-to fly! We gotta rescue FLASH from that vampire before she --
What happened?
My God -- your hands! Your hands are gone!
Does it hurt?
Watch out, you old bird -- Ming wants to marry me.
Flash! Oh darling!
Flash -- when I was in that tub --
Did you mean it?
Is everyone on Mongo CRAZY? Haven't you guys ever heard of TEAMWORK?
Flash - don't do this.
Why?
I'm so homesick -- what I wouldn't give for a nice quiet night with some muggers in Central Park --
Flash!!
Flash, I love you! Win for me, Flash!??
Darling not in front of the Hawkmen --
Help!!
Fit me with what?
Nooo -- it's not true!
Oh Flash -- no -- you can't be dead --
You poor kid -- don't you have a MOM to talk to?

God, Aura -- no wonder you've had problems -- that bastard:  DALE embraces AURA. They cling to each other, bosom against bosom, in perfect womanly understanding. Golden CHORDS are heard. Doors open. AMAZONS enter.
Flash!!!
Flash -- look out -- you're coming back! He can see you now, Flash!
Look -- Earth!
We saved Earth but we lost the capsule --
The extraordinary weather disturbances reported from Africa this morning are now crossing the Atlantic, and are expected to reach the East Coast of the United States by noon.
ZARKOV whirls, slams the TV SOUND OFF and yells at the silently mouthing NEWSMAN on the screen.
Fools! Can't you understand? This is no accident-- it's an ATTACK! An attack planned by a MIND! This is ATTACK!
I predicted it, didn't I?
Ozone layer starting to crack up.
What the hell do I care? I tried to warn him -- he called me mad, like all the others.
Time for us to go, Munson. Get your toothbrush and whatever.
Up. Up and at him.
I can't handle the capsule alone get your toothbrush.
Of course -- I admit that! But this way you'll be giving your life for a chance of saving Earth! Haven't you any spirit at all??
I tell you I can't take it off alone!
Delighted to see you.
Certainly. Just follow me -- up those stairs.
It will get worse.
How did you know?
Insane? Off my rocker?
Up the stairs to the tower! Ahead of me -- quick! --
Quick I said: We haven't much time --
Up the stairs -- RUN!
I need your help to take off! Get in or I shot you dead!
God only knows -- whatever black corner of space this is coming from --
Sit down there! Foot on the red pedal!
By God, we did it! We made it!
I don't know.
Extend your hand! That's the gesture of friendship known everywhere!
Fantastic -- into a Black Hole and out the other side -- to this. Who said Hans Zarkov was mad?
Get out? Why? We're being taken to Ming -- getting at him is our only hope of saving EARTH. It's perfect!
You inhuman fiend!
In the process? You mean Earth still exists?
Klytus can see the future, eh?
Extraordinary. I'd like to study his beta factors -- I wager I could extend them with a course of telekinetic exercise.
Tell me -- when you use this fit does your temporal lobe prickle?
Incredible - the very core of this planet, is it not?
Devil! Why don't you turn this science to peaceful use? The name Ming would be blessed instead of cursed.
Earth!
But that's impossible! Even your perverted genius can't create new life!
Dale Arden.....
Monster!
Basic circuits seem okay.
Jump!!
Come diving out headlong into the grass.
Not gone -- Just invisible. See?
Not a bit. I believe Mongo's gravitational. field must have reversed the polarity of my generator so that --
Neat trick. I wonder if it's controllable?
Hello - we do meet in the strangest places.
He has no choice, Dale it's the Mongo way.
Call it what you want, Vultan --
What'll you have -- death or dishonor?
In the high grass east of Mingo.
Sit there. When I give you zero, punch that button. Any questions?
ZARKOV jumps out, leaving the door open. He crouches low.
Five, four, three, two, one -- ZERO!
Flash!
Do you hear me, Flash? Where are you?
Eureka! I did it! You can come out now, Flash --
His Hawkman dropped him. He's dead.
How do we get down to the plasma level?
Bad. Plasma's contracting into a critical mass. When that needle hits the red, Earth is finished.
Let's face it, my friends -- without a miracle, we've lost.
It is filled with HAWKMEN, flying toward us.
I can't watch any more. To think of all our history ended this way --
Attach the electrodes to the shovels!
Cross your fingers, boys!
You are home.
Shouldn't you fellows be leaving on your honeymoon?
Dr. Zarkov! Look at the report from the last balloon!
Yes, sir -- you sure did. And this funny sun too ---
Go where?
You're crazy!
So what's it matter if I'm shot or go up in that thing? I'm a goner either way, right?
Goodbye, Doctor -- they were all right about you. Have a nice trip.
A sudden gauntlet of careening ASTEROIDS, all sizes, from tiny zingers to one almighty tumbler big as AFRICA.
They survived our Black Hole --
Later, Klytus -- I think we will look at them first.
Step forward, Soldier.
Are you loyal to Ming? Would you die for him?
Fall on your sword.
Of course I'm "inhuman"! -- that's a compliment!
Pathetic Earthlings, forever wondering if you are alone in the universe --
You know who Ming is now -- who are you and why do you come to Mongo?
For the moment -- not for much longer.
You exist -- and yet you pay no homage to Ming! What greater crime can be committed?
Come closer, Dale Arden -- let me see you.
He can foresee it -- but for a few moments only. It gives him a unique gift for survival, -- and treachery.
Chain this one up. Preserve him for further examination.
That one is useless to us. Remove him and kill him.
What would your Prince Barin say?
Really, Aura -- your appetites are too monstrous -- even for our family.
Take the Earth-woman to our quarters!
So Prince Barin will kill Flash Gordon for me -- I don't care.
I haven't taken a wife in centuries.
I am forcing this plasma through the successive nuclear phases of a star -
Bring him up to the dome, Soldiers --
Yes, Zarkov -- as it was. Now as it will be, when my plasma reaches full force.....
And as it will be in yet another time, long after you have died. Earth reborn! A pleasant image, no?
Of course I can create life. There's nothing easier. It only requires myself and one woman.
Who else? As in that childish myth of yours -- Adam and Eve, wasn't it?

The magic blades are not for your kind, Zarkov. One is my own the other will only be withdrawn by my rightful heir. Pull on them with all your MIGHT:  ZARKOV tugs desperately, but it doesn't give an inch. He falls panting over the block.
Return him to the dungeon.

DALE stands amongst the EXOTIC FEMALES of this lavish place, being gently but firmly divested of her clothes and put into a diaphanous gown. They intend her no harm. Though each has some slight unearthly peculiarity, all are very beautiful.
That damned Vultan -- time I clipped his wings once and for all. We could put those insolent Hawkmen of his to work in the plasma cavern ----
We'll let Vultan tame her first --
I see you, Vultan -- and Barin too!
You've always wanted her, Klytus --
Well? What is it this time?
Klytus, you're impossible. Aura deserves you.
No, Captain -- bring it in. Land it to a warm reception.
Through the front we see MING'S CITY dead ahead and below.
You have the ring?
So what are you doing down here, coward? Why aren't you in the fray?
Mingo City is impregnable! I'm not about to put off wedding Dale Arden for this!
The battle continues. Bloodies HAWKMAN CAPTAIN fights his way up beside VULTAN, who is engaged in seizing a dominant piece of ray-gun artillery.
I do.
Seal this hall! Close every portal!
Looks around wildly, whipping out the sword sheathed at his belt. Its blade is like crystal fire. He reacts sharply, catches his breath.
Where did you get that sword?
Impossible! It could only be pulled by my rightful heir!
Hail Ming! Shall I drown them in the Sea of Fire?
Sirs, Earth is the meaningless planet you are in the process of obliterating.
This woman will amuse you.
She betrays you! She'll take him to Aboria!
Don't be too sure!
Mongo is restless today. Your vessels stray from their appointed kingdoms....
Dale Arden and Flash Gordon? Will I send out the Imperial Fleet to bring them back?
Sire, it is not for me to tell Great, Ming that he is making mistakes.
Serried squadrons of HAWKMEN escort the ones bearing FLASH, BARIN and TIGER MAN through space.
We'll find vultan later. Where's Flash Gordon?
I can't remember. I feel danger --
I foresee another thing. In one minute exactly, the Earthling space capsule will be seen on the scanner.
What?
Destroy it.
In my pocket.
I foresaw at blow --
You fight me in vain, Barin I do not foresee my death at your hands --
You are prisoners. I will take you now to Ming the Merciless, Ruler of the universe!
Hail, Ming!
Hail, Ming!
Hail, Ming! Hail, Great One Without Mercy!
Gladly!
Emerging half into the light beside a column, fondling the head of an obscure BEAST slouching between her legs.
Hail, Ming! Hail, Great One Without Mercy!
Don't kill him yet, Father. Give him to me!
I can handle Barin.
But you adore me, Father -- you ca refuse me nothing . Yes?
Take a deep breath! Grab my ankle after we hit the water -- I'll lead you!
Catch your breath -- then I'll take you up and find you a disguise.
I'll fly you to the forest of Arboria -
Do you realize how foolish you are to tell that to me -- Ming's daughter?
You're funny -- are all Eathlings like you, Flash Gordon?
The plasma core. It's e source of the energy-beam my father ia aiming at Earth. You can't stop it. Ming is merciless and all-powerful!
You can't reach him. If a soldier spots you, it's instant death! --
Forget Dale Arden!
Forget her, Flash Gordon: I saw a look in my father's eye -- I think he intends to marry her.
Oh you ask so many questions.
I'm taking you to people who'll help you. Trust me!
Trust me!
Here we are.
I've dressed you as a Royal Pilot, First Class. We'll slip into my personal car and you'll fly it.
Learn from me -- I'll teach you so much!
Open at the top to space. But instead of our familiar pinpoint stars, here whole nebulae wheel in majesty against infinity, their innards popping with explosions as whole galaxies are born and die.
Frigia -- eleventh of the moons of Mongo. It's inhabited by the Bear Men who eat their own young...
Now pull up -- go starboard around that next moon rising -- Ardentia.
Of course - the Sand Men. Every Moon is a kingdom -- seperate and hostile to all the others. They have nothing in common but Ming's rule -- and their hatred of him.
Fight Ming the Merciless?
You saw what happened to the Lizard Men.
I don't know these words what's a "team"?
Telekinetic Thought Transfer.
I'm going to get together with Prince Barin in Arboria and tell him I'm arriving. He's the one who'll help you.
Because he does anything I ask. He loves me.
If I showed you how.
But I'm not going to.
What are you doing?
at Ardentia!
Enough!
There's Arboria!
Who?
Follow me.
Ssssh...... Trust me!
Of a fantastic structure, many levels, built of wood and other materials from the heart of the forest.
It's Barin's hunt! Watch!
It means nothing. They only shout that because it's treason not to.
Go inside -- let me talk to Barin first.
Foolish Earthling - trust me!
BARIN walks up ahead of some TREE MEN who are carrying the TIGER MAN in their nets. Suddenly he stops, reacting to AURA on the balcony.
It's so long since I've been with you, Barin -- I couldn't stand it.
I've dreamed of it!
But that's treason! Blood can be dedicated to Ming alone!
Flash Gordon -- come out!
Hide him from my father -- don't let him wander -- keep him for me!
You still must -- I'm playing a game!
He's a mere toy to me, my love --
It's the risk I ask, Barin hide him for me in Arboria.
Are you so afraid of my Earthling, Barin; Won't you even give him a chance?
I'll do that.
If your love for me is great enough, Barin, surely it will protect you from the serpent -- no?
It's an even chance now, Flash Gordon --
Maybe I was wrong -- surely the Prince of Arboria wouldn't be beaten by a toy.
Barin -- my only -- I swear I didn't mean to get you into this!
It is -- they saw him fall a mile into the glaciers of Frigia.
When I think of being given to Klytus, I wish it was myself who had fallen.
Then what is it that melts into my eyes, Dale Arden? Feel it breaking --
Ming tired of her. He blew my Mother into outer space. I look into the night sky sometimes and wonder what star she's orbiting --
I guess I'm about average.
There are windows on one side, emitting a fierce GLARE. FLASH follows AURA rapidly along. Suddenly he stops short, looking in through the tinted glass.
We are but soldiers. We do not know.
Third elevator down, turn left!
Who is that?
Hail! Ming! Hail, Great one Without Mercy!

AURA leads FLASH out through a doorway. He is now fitted out with a fairly resplendent MONGO costume: boots, cape, headdress and all. They hurry along through shadows. Suddenly FLASH seizes her by the shoulders, stops her.
Drink this.
It has no name. But many brave men died to bring it across space from Cythera, planet of Pleasure. It will make your hours with Ming more agreeable.
We are of different race, Dale Arden but we all are women here. I know your fears. Believe me, it will be better if you drink it...
Rub this on your body. It gives Ming pleasure.
What's the matter?
Time is short. Ming sent me to fit you with is.
Your wedding dress.
With a sudden thoughtful look, his head working.
Adrenaline courses through his veins as he hears that over the uproar.
She blinks, befuddled, pauses in her oiling of herself.
Pinned by AMAZONS, reacting to that.

with the Thought Transference gizmo down over his head, a faint BLUISH GLOW flickering within, as AURA watches him and we SEE the moon Ardentia falling behind rapidly through the glass. FLASH concentrates fiercely. We HEAR his VOICED THOUGHTS but his lips do not move.
He is coming to see you now. Are you ready?
Do you need any more of this?
Serving Girl - what business have you in this dungeon?
I'm looking at it now -- wait for your turn.
climbing the ramp-like stairs which wind up around it in a mounting spiral. SUddenly the forest rings with SINGSONG CRIES and CALLS I mingled with a sort of ROARING SNARL.
Barin got him!
Prince Barin! We have him!
The sight -- call came from the left!
Hail, Ming!
I scent a Tiger Man near the lodge!
Aura!
Angry at you?
You'll stay the night?
Get me a sword --
This is the fiercest Tiger Man we have ever hunted. I'm going to kill him now -- and dedicate his blood to you, my beloved.
I know you, Aura -- the more a man risks, the greater your passion. If I knew a greater risk, I'd take it.
What in hell? My help?
What? What are you saying?
I'll hide him, all right -- under six feet of Arborian dirt!
Snake keeper! Rouse your beast!
Who dares the beast?
I did him a mercy. This venom brings death only after long tortured madness. Your turn, Earthling.
There are six openings to the serpent.
Go again.
Fooled you, didn't I?
If I were you, I'd choose the sword --
A mere toy of yours, eh?
The hunt's on, my Tree Men!
Up and across we'll cut them off!
I saved you because your death must be mine.
Is lowered more carefully on another terrace, this one grander, with a throne in the center.
Will you do that, Vultan?
Yes -- I would hunt you down and kill you without mercy.
Not a word.
I was hunting him when you seized me. Before you finish me. Vultan I beg only that you let me finish him.
I had you in bow-sight you were dead!
Ready for me, Earthling?
What do you now of Aura?
A force-field covers the whole city, from here to here. With luck, Flash can lure them into lowering their defenses.
Ming destroyed your kingdom!
Vultan!
Look -- he still casts a shadow:  It's true. FLASH is totally invisible, but on the ground we SEE his shadow as he climbs out and stands upright.
Zarkov! What have you done?
This won't be easy, Flash --
How's it look to yoU?
You're blinded, Klytus -- drop your sword!
Lunges with horror, slashes with his sword point.
His eyes widen horribly, he makes a choked sound. PULL BACK FAST as he whips his hand out, unbitten. His face twists into a grin.

He dashes for the ramp to the ground.. The TIGER MAN is right in front of him, struggling in the net. FLASH pauses, SLASHES at the cords. TIGER MAN is freed, bounds to his feet with a ROAR, clobbers a pair of TREE MEN just jumping on him and FLASH. Snatching one's CROSSBOW and QUIVER OF GLASS ARROWS, he races down the ramp behind FLASH.
Picking himself up, wheeling furiously on AURA, who has been watching all this with her lips half parted, her tongue flicking teeth in supersensuous excitement.
To the hunt with Barin!
They run through the green tangle. FLASH trips over a vine.
Thank you for freeing me.
For all the good it does me.
Only if we climb -- out of the green light -- to the sky -- Prince Barin's Tree Men can't follow us up there!
Ming's Law -- outside his own kingdom, every hunter becomes the hunted!
I don't know --no man has ever been above the green.
What is that color above?
Legend says Arboria ends in an ocean to the west.
Yes!!
Nooo!!!
Listen to his words! --
I know -- I'm only an ignorant Tiger Man -- but I tell you Flash Gordon is the leader we've waited for!
Grrao! I'll charge down at them:  ZARKOV and BARIN just look at him. TIGER MAN slumps out of his fighting stance.
Look!
You haven't a chance! Throw down your weapon!
Are startled as the arrow WHIRRS in and sticks into the branch under their feet. The branch instantly turns to ICE.
Hover, their wings beating the air. They dive on FLASH and TIGER MAN, lift them too.
ZARKOV stops abruptly, looking down at himself. DALE gasps.
Want us to let you go, et?
Okay.
Carrying FLASH and BARIN and TIGER MAN , going into a screaming dive.
Flying down from above, hovering above BARIN with menacing glee.
As the VOICE goes on:  MING'S VOICE Do you want to live, Vultan?
Ho! -- Barin! - I knew my Hawkmen would catch you one of these days.
Not in my Kingdom -- here you're just a stray animal to be killed for our sport!
What would you do if you'd caught me in Arboria?
No. What have you to say to Vultan, Prince of the Air?
You're a leader, he?
Do you understand him?
Enough!
These vagrants talk a brave fight, my Hawkmen! Shall we test their words?
Take them below -- put them together.
VULTAN leads the way down. FLASH, BARIN, DALE, ZAAKOV and TIGER MAN are escorted by many fierce HAWKMEN.
Prepare them!
Arm the disc!
You've won, Earthling! Drop him to doom!
What is this??
What creature wants to die?
We'll save these Earthlings! - Curse Ming! -- Into the air, my Hawkpeople -
I don't understand this. I think I've gone mad.
Don't look back, Hawkman. Head for that cloud-cover!
Where's this capsule of yours, exactly?
Pick it up, Captain!
What if he fails?
This is suicide, Barin! I can't order my men to suicide!
The flight brought me back to my senses -- good luck and goodbye.
We'll build another.
He calls us crazy --
It's an armed camp. SOLDIERS stand admits tanks and ray-gun artillery, every weapon trained on a landing pad in the middle.
Through the force-field, my Hawkmen!
Who are these Earthlings, that so many would die for?
Onward, Hawkmen! Dive! We outnumber their arrows -- overwhelm them!
Ming!
Be careful how you address me, Vultan.
Test them! -- Let's have sport! The joust! -- To the joust! --
SHOTS - ASH AND BARIN getting prepared. Removing shirts being equipped with heavy leather gauntlets, and so on. Each is given a long vicious WHIP.
TIGER MAN suddenly leaps out onto the disc, slides over between the knives, helps FLASH pull BARIN up to safety.
ZARKOV in his chains, walks over to the confused VULTAN...
AURA tries to throw herself into his arm, but he pushes her roughly away.
As an effulgent GLOW envelopes her. Inexorably, DALE and her HAWKMEN are sucked upward.
As INVISIBLE HANDS turn around the helmet on his head.
Hope drains from his expression.
Prisoners of Ming, you are surrounded!
Howls in terror, makes a break for cover. A RAY instantly zaps down at him and he EXPLODES into fiery fragments.
Shall I disintegrate it, Your Majesty?
Just sit there, grim-faced. VULTAN shake his head.
It's empty!
Unmanned. Must've taken off on some automatic program.
Faster! -- More fueld!
He wants to give Dale Arden the final destruction of Earth as a wedding present.
Lets out a bitter sigh. Then the SHADOW moves again, fast, to an open doorway.
Stands on guard. Suddenly out of nowhere, but very close.
What's the hurry?
All right -- I see the towers lined up now as Flash Gordon said --
It's a trap! The passage is covered!
What's for us after this lot?
THREE HAWKMEN are SEEN in steep descent. comes ,INTO FOCUS over them.
In range.
Man the battlements!
Your Majesty, we're under attack by Hawkmen!
Sire, I thought you'd --
Do you take her, this Earthling, Dale Arden, to be your Empress of the hour? Do you solemnly promise to use her as you will -- not discard her until such time as you grow weary of her?
The wedding ring, please --
Recite after me -- with this ring I thee wed --
His face contorted, he flies at INVISIBLE FLASH behind the sword. FLASH parries the blow. Astonishing pyrotechnics as the blades hit each other. Shrieking MONGONS flee under showers of fire.
HAWKMEN and LIZARD MEN SLAVES engage MING'S PEOPLE.
As he swivels his head for a quick look. He freezes, gives a CRY of unmitigated rage. FLASH seizes the instant, thrust his sword.
